document_data.caption: A map showing the location of Stormweather Villa (labeled 149) on Ussilbran Street.
document_data.name: Stormweather Villa
document_data.mainbody: '''Stormweather Villa''' was the family estate of the [[Nobility of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian noble house]] [[Stormweather]].
document_data.Location: The villa was located in the central section of [[Waterdeep]]'s [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]] on [[Ussilbran Street]] just north of [[Sulmor Street]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Description: The three buildings of Stormweather Villa stood between two and five stories tall.
